Onboarding Image of Selecting a Brand
Select a Brand
Image of Insert Serial Number
Insert Serial Number
Choose the brand you use from our list of existing brands
Insert Serial Number found on your device, or you can scan QR code using our app
After adding the serial number, our app will provide details about your device such as manufactored origin, and date of manufactor
Image of viewing the details of a device
Get Started
Frequently Asked Questions
How does the serial get decoded?

For every brand, there\'s a serial, and that serial represent certain words that are encoded into that serial, and each character, or number represent a meaning, we take all that and decode every character, or sequence of characters to provide its meaningful pre-encoded message, such as its manufactor type, or date of manufactor, and the type of serial inserted, all that within a scan of the serial QR code
What Brands are available on the app?
We\'ve got Samsung TVs and LG TVs so far, and we are planning to add more brands, and manufactures soon
Do you have any other web applications?
Yes, you can visit Google\'s Play Store to check some of our apps.
